/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
